objarg.name: serial number
objarg.digest: Manta serial number to look for (if you are using multiple mantas)
objarg.description: Manta serial number to look for (if you are using multiple mantas)

method.name: raw
method.digest: turn on/off raw mode (output raw sensor values, without removing baseline values)
method.description: turn on/off raw mode (output raw sensor values, without removing baseline values)

method.name: oneindex
method.digest: turn on/off one indexed mode (first sensor is 1 instead of 0)
method.description: turn on/off one indexed mode (first sensor is 1 instead of 0)

method.name: turbo
method.digest: turn on/off turbo mode (scan only the bottom 16 sensors but much faster)
method.description: turn on/off turbo mode (scan only the bottom 16 sensors but much faster)

method.name: ledsoff
method.digest: clear all pad and button leds
method.description: clear all pad and button leds
